name: Fast Formula New Modern Car
description:
Drive heavy duty fuel consuming vehicle include formula car racer model. Be the rally racer among the world's most famous insane fast track drivers. Race with tremendous speed in this authentic highway race. Take your high speed vehicle off track as your engine catch fire to avoid accident with the neighboring road drivers. Drive efficiently as you will come across deadly crashes and engine burnout accidents. Stretch your winning streak by sports car driving on superior exemption routes.
Features:

- Stand at the formula one top position by cruising fast and drifting hard on speed tracks
- Be the sick racing freak who lives his life on the death trolling ridge
- Get your hands behind the power steering of action packed highway car racing pursuit
- Drive crazy top speed monster vehicles on flat road ramps
- Avoid city traffic rules when you ride a monster drive in this racing championship
